subMembers.name: Configuration
subMembers.description: This section describes properties used to configure the component.

subMembers.name: elementAttr
subMembers.description: Specifies the global attributes to be attached to the UI component's container element.

subMembers.name: rtlEnabled
subMembers.description: Switches the UI component to a right-to-left representation.

properties.name: DOMComponent
properties.description: A base class for all components.

Methods.name: defaultOptions(rule)
Methods.description: Specifies the device-dependent default configuration properties for this component.

Methods.name: dispose()
Methods.description: Disposes of all the resources allocated to the {WidgetName} instance.

Methods.name: element()
Methods.description: Gets the root UI component element.

Methods.name: getInstance(element)
Methods.description: Gets the instance of a UI component found using its DOM node.
